summary:
With this script you can have your horse carry your items for you.  While riding a horse, pressing Ctrl opens your horse\'s inventory.

IMPORTANT NOTE: SKYRIM DELETES HORSE INVENTORY AFTER A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TIME.
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT NOTE:

[u][B]SKYRIM DELETES HORSE INVENTORY AFTER A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TIME.[/B][/u]

This can happen if you leave the area your horse is in.   Until this can be fixed, this mod is only for short-term item storage.  Basically, don\'t leave your horse alone for extended periods of time or it will be robbed.


-Description-
This script allows you to access your horse\'s inventory.  While riding a horse, press Left Ctrl to open its inventory.  To use a different key to open its inventory, edit the .ini file.

-Requirements-
Requires Script Dragon, found here: http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?/topic/477268-rel-script-dragon/

-Installation-
1. Install Script Dragon from the above link.
2. Place packhorse.asi and packhorse.ini into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. Not the Data folder.

-Uninstalling-
Delete packhorse.asi and packhorse.ini.

-Credit-
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon
author: Eldiran
